power-0.title: Incapacitated
power-0.text: Unable to lift or move anything

power-1.title: Feeble
power-1.text: Barely able to lift very light objects.

power-2.title: Weak
power-2.text: Struggles with light objects, easily exhausted.

power-3.title: Below Average
power-3.text: Handles light tasks, struggles with moderate weights.

power-4.title: Slightly Below Average
power-4.text: Manages everyday tasks, struggles with heavier loads.

power-5.title: Average
power-5.text: Lifts moderate weights, performs common physical tasks.

power-6.title: Above Average
power-6.text: Easily handles heavier tasks and moderate weights.

power-7.title: Strong
power-7.text: Lifts heavy objects, performs strenuous activities.

power-8.title: Very Strong
power-8.text: Handles very heavy objects, excels in physical tasks.

power-9.title: Extremely Strong
power-9.text: Lifts extremely heavy objects with ease.

power-10.title: Superhuman
power-10.text: Performs phenomenal feats, far beyond natural human limits.

dexterity-3.title: Below Average
dexterity-3.text: Struggles with fine motor skills, uncoordinated.

dexterity-5.title: Average
dexterity-5.text: Performs common tasks with normal coordination.

dexterity-6.title: Above Average
dexterity-6.text: Handles precise tasks well, smooth movements.

dexterity-7.title: Nimble
dexterity-7.text: Quick reflexes, handles complex tasks easily.

dexterity-8.title: Very Nimble
dexterity-8.text: Highly precise and agile in movements.

dexterity-9.title: Extremely Nimble
dexterity-9.text: Performs intricate tasks with exceptional ease.

computation-0.title: Incomprehensible
computation-0.text: Unable to follow or understand logical processes.

computation-1.title: Very Poor
computation-1.text: Struggles with basic reasoning, frequent errors.

computation-3.title: Below Average
computation-3.text: Struggles with complex reasoning, makes simple mistakes.

computation-4.title: Slightly Below Average
computation-4.text: Understands simple logic, errors with complexity.

computation-5.title: Average
computation-5.text: Reasonably follows and applies logical thinking.

computation-6.title: Above Average
computation-6.text: Good at solving moderately complex logical problems.

computation-7.title: Proficient
computation-7.text: Strong logical reasoning, solves complex problems.

computation-8.title: Highly Proficient
computation-8.text: Highly logical, excels at intricate reasoning.

computation-9.title: Exceptional
computation-9.text: Exceptional logical thinking, solves advanced problems.

computation-10.title: Genius
computation-10.text: Flawless logic, solves extremely complex problems effortlessly.

feel-2.title: Very Limited
feel-2.text: Detects only intense stimuli, often misses details

feel-3.title: Limited
feel-3.text: Struggles to notice subtle changes, misses many cues.

feel-4.title: Below Average
feel-4.text: Notices common stimuli, but struggles with subtleties.

feel-5.title: Average
feel-5.text: Detects and interprets typical sensory information.

feel-6.title: Above Average
feel-6.text: Notices details others miss, quicker reactions.

feel-7.title: Keen
feel-7.text: Highly attuned, detects subtle changes easily.

feel-9.title: Exceptional
feel-9.text: Almost superhuman sensory perception and awareness.

feel-10.title: Superhuman
feel-10.text: Unparalleled sensory acuity, detects the imperceptible.

presence-2.title: Minimal
presence-2.text: Struggles to be noticed, easily forgotten.

presence-4.title: Below Average
presence-4.text: Makes minimal impression, struggles to stand out.

presence-5.title: Average
presence-5.text: Holds own in interactions, moderate impact.

presence-9.title: Exceptional
presence-9.text: Captivating presence, leaves a lasting impression.

serverErrors.CYPU-101: Content of the {{field}} object can not be empty
serverErrors.CYPU-105: You need to log in to do this request
serverErrors.CYPU-201: Some error occurred while creating the {{field}}
